body: She's saying tons of gibberish made up (by the author) words that are popular among JCs
I'm fluent in Japanese but I didn't understand shit what his sister was saying  lol According to the afterword she's a very godly person tho anyway I need a 'translation' of this

Can someone explain me what she misunderstood or what she is going on about?
I'm can only read Japanese at beginner level, I understand that her brother didn't know what "ponchi" is and go along with it.
